name: Stelrad Radiators
description:
Stelrad Radiators is Europe’s favourite radiator, and UK market leader in Steel Panel. Manufacturing site and distribution facility based in Mexborough, South Yorkshire, and produces over 2 million steel panel radiators a year, for both the domestic and commercial. 
Stelrad Radiators offers the marketplace everything from classic, traditional radiators to sophisticated, stylish models - Stelrad has a wide variety of styles and finishes to harmonise with any period or contemporary setting.
As well as the hugely popular standard steel panel radiators, Stelrad manufactures a range of premium panel radiators, benefiting from the latest technology – to include single double and triple panel radiators – including the latest K3 options.  Stelrad also offers a range of vertical radiators to accompany the horizontal version, along with a wide range of decorative towel rails and warmers, column radiators and low surface temperature (LST) radiators that meet the most stringent. 
Stelrad’s product portfolio encompasses a vast number of styles in variety of heights, lengths and connection options.

Range is as follows:

Panel Radiators: Elite, Compact and Softline.

Premium Panel: Planar, Classic Column, Compact with Style, Style Lo-line, Compact with Style Vertical, Concord Plane and Concord Lo-line 

Energy Saving: Stelrad Radical 

Low Surface Temperature: LST Standard, LST Plus and LST Vertical vertical 

Towel Warmers: Ladder Rail, Esprit 

Designer Range: Caliente, Excel, Optia, Wave, Arc, Ellipse, Vistaline.

You'll find information on our web site at www.stelrad.com on the entire product range - as well as the services we offer in support of our products. You’ll quickly discover why Stelrad radiators are the UK’s favourite radiators.

product_images.title: Stelrad Compact with Style
product_images.description: The Premium panel radiator range offers a more contemporary, stylish option. The range includes the Planar with a slim profile, the Classic Column for a period or contemporary look, the Compact with Style and the Style Lo-line featuring a fine lined surface, Compact with Style Vertical and the Concord Plane and Concord Lo-line constructed from slim, flat horizontal tubes.

product_images.title: Stelrad Concord Range
product_images.description: The Premium panel radiator range offers a more contemporary, stylish option. The range includes the Planar with a slim profile, the Classic Column for a period or contemporary look, the Compact with Style and the Style Lo-line featuring a fine lined surface, Compact with Style Vertical and the Concord Plane and Concord Lo-line constructed from slim, flat horizontal tubes.

product_images.title: Stelrad Caliente
product_images.description: The Designer range offers a decorative, eye-catching feature in any room, whilst providing effective, high performance heating. An extensive range of colours is available within this range to fully coordinate with any interior space. The range includes the Caliente, Excel, Optia, Wave, Arc, Ellipse, Vistaline.

product_images.title: Stelrad Column Radiator
product_images.description: The Premium panel radiator range offers a more contemporary, stylish option. The range includes the Planar with a slim profile, the Classic Column for a period or contemporary look, the Compact with Style and the Style Lo-line featuring a fine lined surface, Compact with Style Vertical and the Concord Plane and Concord Lo-line constructed from slim, flat horizontal tubes.

product_images.title: Stelrad Compact K3 Radiator
product_images.description: The recent addition to the Stelrad Compact range is the triple panelled K3 radiator which is ideal for low energy systems giving an outstanding heat output from a small footprint.The Compact K3 is available in 40 models and has sizes ranging from 400mm to 700mm heights and 400mm to 2400 lengths. The Compact K3 comes with a 10 year warranty

product_images.title: Stelrad LST Radiator
product_images.description: Stelrad Radiators range of low surface temperature radiators – both the LST Standard and the LST Plus options in horizontal and vertical options –offer the perfect solution for heating systems in buildings where vulnerable people need to be protected from the levels of surface heat emitted from a standard radiator – in particular children and older people.

product_images.title: Stelrad Radical Radiator
product_images.description: The Stelrad Radical energy saving radiator’s unique and innovative technology raises comfort levels, and by working more efficiently, it reduces energy bills by up to 10.5%. The Stelrad Radical energy saving radiator reaches its maximum temperature 23% faster than a traditional radiator and after only 2 minutes it offers up to 50% more radiant heat.
